SEARCH
Package bcm.components

Class RegistryComponent

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
bcm.components.RegistryComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
public class RegistryComponent extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent

Description

The registry component is responsible for registering and looking up nodes in the network. It is also responsible for finding neighbours of a node.

Invariant
